<MethodEndpoint

Confirms the validity of the given action name. Append `?name=<your_action_name>`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
